Original:
這是一家愛爾蘭酒吧，不得不說一進這間酒吧就被周圍的裝潢給吸引住。
復古的人物跟風景照，簡單卻穩重的木製裝潢，溫暖的燈光，很適合上班後小聚的地方。

店內沒有酒單，深水炸彈也很特別，還有紅牛shot搭配，更重要的是有德國的Radler (愛爾蘭稱Poor Man Champion) 。

Radler 源自於Das Fahrrad (腳踏車），騎腳踏車的人則為 Der Radler/ Die Radlerin。啤酒及汽水比例為1:1，讓騎腳踏車的人可以路過喝一杯也不會醉得名（德國人酒量好？）。
喝起來口味會因為搭配的汽水而產生變化。最傳統的是用七喜或雪碧，這兩種飲品口味較為清淡，不會太濃厚蓋過啤酒原本的香氣。有些人則會用橘子芬達，或是零卡可樂。
EN:
This is an Irish bar, and I have to say that as soon as I entered this bar, it was attracted by the surrounding decoration.
Retro characters and landscape photos are simple but stable wooden decoration, warm lights, which are suitable for small gatherings after work.

There are no wine lists in the store, and deep -water bombs are also very special. There is also the matching of Red Bull SHOT. More importantly, there are German Radler (Irish called Poor Man Champion).

Radler is derived from the DAS FAHRRAD (bicycle), and the person riding a bicycle is Der Radler/ Die Radlerin.The ratio of beer and soda is 1: 1, so that people who ride bicycles can pass a drink by passing a drink (the Germans are good?).
Drinking the taste will change due to the matching soda.The most traditional is Qixi or Sprite. These two drinks have a lighter taste and will not be too strong to cover the original aroma of beer.Some people use Orange Fanta or Zero Coca -Cola.

Original:
是個晚上適合三五好友聊天的酒吧！黑啤泡沫很綿密，晚上九點人不多、可以安安靜靜的聊天，晚一點之後人變蠻多，需要有點大聲的說話才行。
餐點都蠻適合配著黑啤，剛上桌都超香，吃飽又稱職的下酒菜；喜歡店裡面的桌椅，木頭摸起來很舒服！
EN:
It is a bar that is suitable for three or five friends at night!The dark beer foam is very dense. There are not many people at nine o'clock in the evening. They can chat quietly. After a little later, there are a lot of people, and they need to speak loudly.
The meals are quite suitable for dark beer. They are super fragrant when they are just serving.

What you need to drink without a menu bar need to think about.

Original:
厚重的門後面藏著別有洞天，朋友的麻吉恰好是吧天得，很專業熱心地準備了數款🥃和調酒。最大的啟發反而是他說Simon Sinek的書《The Infinite Game》，給拒看心靈雞湯的理大飽的當頭棒喝，還帶學生看了他的YouTube影片。

不過小的對「社畜」說法感冒😷 儘管社會學家當然瞭解結構性的因素，我不認為凡事都是社會的錯，老闆「慣」與不慣也沒那麼一翻兩瞪眼，智識上可以說得上話的人，這位吧天得算一號～

照片是2021/04/04 拍的，但去過兩次，有點兒分不清楚哪是哪。評論則是2021/05/08發的，忙到天翻地覆，沒時間力氣放鬆，自然沒有時間飲酒。阿燜～

There are other caves hidden behind the thick door. The friend's Muji happened to be heavenly. He was very enthusiastic and prepared several pupae and bartending.The biggest inspiration was that he said that Simon Sinek's book "The Infinite Game" was given to the full -bouncing head of the soul chicken soup, and he also watched his YouTube video.

However, Xiao's statement of "Social Animal" has a cold. Although sociologists certainly understand the structural factors, I don't think everything is a society's fault. Those who can speak, this one is the number one ~

The photo was taken in 2021/04/04, but after twice, I was a bit unclear.The comments were sent at 2021/05/08. They were so busy that they had no time to relax, and naturally there was no time to drink.Ah 焖 ~

Original: 這個地方絕對是一顆寶石。人潮眾多，服務優質。這個地方的名字再準確不過了。與周圍的人開始對話非常容易。向酒吧團隊大聲喊叫。我們度過了一個美好的夜晚
EN: This place is definitely a gem.There are many crowds and high -quality services.The name of this place is no longer accurate.It is easy to start talking to people around.Shout to the bar team.We spent a beautiful night

Original: 喝啤酒的好地方。他們倒了一杯很棒的吉尼斯黑啤酒。
EN: Good place to drink beer.They poured a great Guinness black beer.

Original: 酒吧氛圍很棒，老闆和員工熱情好客。
EN: The atmosphere of the bar is great, and the boss and employees are enthusiastic.

Original: 台北最好的吉尼斯黑啤酒！如果您錯過了酒吧體驗，強烈推薦，海倫和她的團隊讓您有賓至如歸的感覺。他們的食物也很好👍 …
EN: The best Guinness black beer in Taipei!If you miss the bar experience and highly recommend it, Helen and her team give you a feeling of guests.Their food is also very good ...

Original: 非常友好和熱情的酒吧。木質外觀的背後隱藏著不同的世界。牆上貼滿了愛爾蘭的照片。令人難以置信的舒適和溫馨。海倫和她的員工讓您感到賓至如歸。這家酒吧距離都柏林有一英里，但這裡的吉尼斯黑啤酒非常美味
EN: Very friendly and enthusiastic bar.There are different worlds behind the wood appearance.The wall is covered with Irish photos.Unbelievable comfort and warmth.Helen and her employees make you feel at home.This bar is one mile from Dublin, but the Guinness black beer here is very delicious

Original: 在錯過航班並丟失酒店預訂後，我於 12:45 左右到達了這個地方。  廚房關了，但是那位非常友善且醉酒的調酒師回來給我做了一份燉牛肉和麵包，非常棒。  凌晨 1 點到 4 點 30 分期間，醉酒而友好的調酒師收起了 3 瓶紅酒和 15 杯詹姆森和龍舌蘭酒。  這是我在旅行中見過的最令人印象深刻的飲酒展示之一。  這就像《法櫃奇兵》中的飲酒場景。  這個地方很棒，牆上有克里斯蒂·摩爾、盧克·凱利、自動點唱機以及一群友好的旅行者和外籍人士。  非常感謝露娜和海倫。
EN: After missing the flight and lost the hotel reservation, I arrived at this place around 12:45.The kitchen was closed, but the very friendly and drunk bartender came back to make a stew and bread for me, which is great.During the period from 1 am to 4:30 in the morning, the drunk and friendly bartender put away 3 bottles of red wine and 15 glasses of Jameson and agave.This is one of the most impressive drinking display I have ever seen during the trip.This is like the drinking scene in "French Cabinet".This place is great, with Christie Moore, Luke Kelly, automatic point singer, and a group of friendly travelers and foreigners.Thank you Luna and Helen very much.

Original: 這是一個吃飯喝酒和結識來自世界各地的人們的好地方。我和大家一起度過了一段非常愉快的時光。海倫很棒，她經營這個地方。我遇到了來自愛爾蘭、德國，當然還有台灣的人。
EN: This is a good place to eat and drink and meet people from all over the world.I spent a very happy time with everyone.Helen is great, she runs this place.I met people from Ireland, Germany, and of course there are people in Taiwan.

Original: 輝煌熱鬧的地方！如果您在附近，請順便過來喝一杯。主人很開朗而且非常熱情。
